ASCII.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a system used for exchanging information between computers by allowing them to recognize letters, numbers etc in the same way
ASCII.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: American Standard Code for Information Interchange; a simple computer code in which letters are represented by numbers. Many different computers can read information stored in ASCII, so people often change documents into ASCII form before sending them to someone else
ASCII.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: converting word-processor files into standard ASCII format
